post.body: especially since bad came out as nad. Lol
toonad it isn't bigger. But it feels nice. That sounds dirty but I swear I'm talkin bout the heat and got water bottle
can't find the heating pad but I just remembered where the hot water bottle is :)
no tub. And I can't even take a shower because it is only about 10 ft from elijahs bed. But got washrag to face may help
back. And I swear if sinuses weren't already void spaces I would rip the fuckers out
my superpower is being able to tell the weather by the pain in my head. And then followed by the tensing of muscles in neck and
its freakin killin me. I need a hot tub.
yes I got it! I just haven't started functioning yet today! Sorry you've had a bad week. I guess I missed that
basically I don't sleep much!!
she is so super sweet and wonderful =)
read your directmessages / @replies!!!!
lol joe wears way too much makeup!!!!
be careful on the trip home :)
your scstar is making me so hungry!
he ate a xmas light! Had to go to ER but he's totally fine.
oops. Started watchin a movie and spaced! Doin ok. E had a great time and got lots a fun crap. You should read my blog...
just wanted to say hello
hope you're havin a good holiday time!
but I'm a twilight fiend! And totally in ove with Edward (the character) But that is just me lol
*gasp* the 2nd book is slow finally gets good at the end. The next book is good and last one too. They are slow in beginning some.
read the book first. Its a fast read. They cut a bunch out of the movie. Lots of character development missing
I'm tired of hurting. Please weather, change already!
I'm so tired of headaches. If only my superpower wasn't being able to forecast rain with my head pain...
Pics of cutie Elijah with Santa on my blog http://blisskitty.blogspot.com
getting ready to head home. finally
had to make cozies for my mugs because i always space my coffee and can't find it... then it gets cold and i cry... so sad. ok not really
and the dark green coffee mug cozy http://tinyurl.com/6ya3gj
unfortunately it is a joe episode and not a steve episode. wish elijah was being good so i could watch something other than blues clues
so tired... can't go home yet. at least i get to watch blues clues...
New blog post with pics of my latest crafty endeavors http://blisskitty.blogspot.com
Listening to twilight on audio book. There is no way I could listen to an audio book if I hadn't read the book
Felting done! 2 can cozies and 2 bottle cozies. 3 are for 1 trade and 1 is the beginning of another.
Boogie is in bed. Now cross your fingers that he'll fall asleep!
Bob the builder... When this is over the munchie is goin to bed :) then I'm felting beer cozies
RT @BreakingNewsOn: Pinup model Bettie Page has died in a Los Angeles hospital at age 85 after suffering a heart attack, her agent says
My mama rocks. She just picked up elijah and left chocolate ice cream. Unfortunately I'm still sick and not feeling so well.
I soooo need a hot tub.
Thanks to everyone for the get well soon wishes. I'm such a baby when I'm sick. Elijah is sick too but doesn't seem as miserable as me!
I'm sick :(
Posted a blog last night with pics of some of my craftiness http://blisskitty.blogspot.com
Truck breaking on xmas... The gift that keeps on giving
Kite = bite
Elijah decided to eat part of a Christmas light. As in kite into the glass and swallow. Just got back from emergency room
I'm feeling better and dare I say it? Almost well!
At the theater about to watch twilight again :)
72 degrees here. Supposed to reach 75 today
